00007 using namespace Sass;
00008 
00009 Context ctx = Context(Context::Data());
00010 To_String to_string;
00011 
00012 Compound_Selector* selector(string src)
00013 { return Parser::from_c_str(src.c_str(), ctx, "", Position()).parse_simple_selector_sequence(); }
00014 
00015 void unify(string lhs, string rhs)
00016 {
00017   Compound_Selector* unified = selector(lhs + ";")->unify_with(selector(rhs + ";"), ctx);
00018   cout << lhs << " UNIFIED WITH " << rhs << " =\t" << (unified ? unified->perform(&to_string) : "NOTHING") << endl;
00019 }
00020 
00021 int main()
00022 {
00023   unify(".foo", ".foo.bar");
00024   unify("div:nth-of-type(odd)", "div:first-child");
00025   unify("div", "span:whatever");
00026   unify("div", "span");
00027   unify("foo:bar::after", "foo:bar::first-letter");
00028   unify(".foo#bar.hux", ".hux.foo#bar");
00029   unify(".foo#bar.hux", ".hux.foo#baz");
00030   unify("*:blah:fudge", "p:fudge:blah");
00031 
00032   return 0;
